Scenario: Submit valid data via contact us form # contactus.feature:3 Given I access webdriveruniversity contact us form # ContactUsSteps.i_access_webdriveruniversity_contact_us_form() When I enter a valid firstname # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_a_valid_firstname() When I enter a valid last name # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_a_valid_last_name(DataTable) And i enter a valid email address # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_a_valid_email_address() And i enter comments # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_comments(DataTable) When i click on the submit button # ContactUsSteps.i_click_on_the_submit_button() Then the information should successfully be submitted via the contact us form # ContactUsSteps.the_information_should_successfully_be_submitted_via_the_contact_us_form()

testcase.name: feature

Scenario Outline: validate promo code alert is visible when clicking on the special offers link # products.feature:10 Given user navigates to "http://www.webdriveruniversity.com/Page-Object-Model/products.html" website # ProductSteps.user_navigates_to_website(String) When user clicks on "#container-special-offers2" # ProductSteps.user_clicks_on(String) Then user should be presented with a promo alert # ProductSteps.user_should_be_presented_with_a_promo_alert()
